case.title: Tall Black & Slim male Need a BBW for.... (Bklyn ,NY)
case.text: 5'9" Drama free 30 yrs. Black guy needs a Busty Down to earth Fun loving Bbw. Looking to hook up after chatting and exchanging pics. Im a nice guy, slim. Very Clean , nice lips and cool personality. I can travel to you or host in evenings. I really enjoy Oral, especially giving. Looking for a BBw any age or race. **IM NOT YOUR SPONSORS OR SUGAR DADDY SO BYPASS ME**** very serious. please send your info, I will responde with a few Pics.
